title: Bhel Puri/ Murmura Masala/ Puffed rice masala mix
content:
Ingredients: Puffed rice/ Murmura/ Borugullu - 1 bowl Finely chopped onion - 1/2 cup Finely chopped tomato - 1/2 cup Finely chopped jugni/ cucumber - 1/2 cup Grated Carrot - 1/2 cup coriander - 1/2 cup Sesame seeds - 1 teaspoon Green chillies+Mint leaves paste - 1 tb sp Red chilli powder - 1/2 teaspoon Cumin/Jeerapowder -1/2 teaspoon Coriander powder - 1/2 teaspoon Garam Masala powder - 1/2 teaspoon Roasted ground nuts/ peanuts - 2 tb sp Lemon juice - 1/2 tb sp Salt - as per taste Ghee - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Saute puffed rice/ Murmura on medium heated frying pan for 5 mins
  • In a medium sized bowl mix all chopped veggies,coriander and grated carrot
  • Add peanuts,sesame seeds,jerra, coriander,red chilly powder,salt,ghee,garam masala & chilli paste
  • Mix well
  • Add puffed rice and mix them well
  • Garnish with sesame seeds and coriander
  • Serve it as a evening snack
